__e: Both of you, turn around. Put your hands on top of your head and interlock your fingers.
Turn around and get your hands against the bar-- move!
He can find someone you know, turn them on you.
And if you don't care to believe that, then you can turn around and walk right out.
Don't you think it'd be best for everyone if you just turned around and walked away?
I can roll over if I want to.
Your father would be spinnin' if I did anything else today.
Think anyone would take a second look at you if it wasn't for your uncle?
